website_summaries.verdict: This is the most inexpensive way to dive into creating with Minecraft alongside some sweet extras, like exploring a plastic world and playing as the spooky Frankencrafter.
pros: Includes Creator’s Pack featuring 2 skin packs, a texture pack, Greek Mythology Pack, and 700 Minecoins
Available on Xbox One and Windows
cons: While the bonuses in this version are exclusive to Microsoft platforms, you can still play with friends using different gaming platforms

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5th grade daughter. She plays normally on her phone and we decided to switch her to xbox one. This came with 4 skin packs and 700 Minecraft coins. Has all the updates as were on her phones Minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: Beware even if you buy it brand new the codes that come with it (what you’re paying an extra 10$ for) might not work. Came in a timely manner but everything else about setting it up to trying to get the codes to work has been so bad I’ve considered just sending it back and doing what everyone should do which is buy it on Xbox. So in conclusion if you can just buy this from the XBOX store on the console you won’t sufffer the headache that is Microsoft’s inabilities to send out a game as promised.
customer_reviews.author: onpointe

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have game for any young kids. My 2 boys (6 and 9) love it. I'd use the word addicted. Fun stuff.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Mine it to craft it
customer_reviews.text: It is what you make of it...get it...because you build stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have an xbox one s and it works great on it. If you use the codes on the xbox store it will take about 15 minutes to load to minecraft. All the packs work great and I thought they were the trial ones but you can save data on them. Only con is that if you want to play with someone else you need xbox live gold.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Di Maio

customer_reviews.title: Great game for kids
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old absolutely loves it. Could spend hours playing.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Grandson was excited to get it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandson . He was so excited , to have the actual game disc He said that way he will always have the original game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Don likes having coins and skins as part of starter pack.
customer_reviews.author: busyparent

customer_reviews.title: Best game purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! They game was in great shape super fun for the kiddos. They love mindcraft and have not wanted to get off of the Xbox since this arrived. The game says one player but you can do a dual player feature so multiple players can play on a split screen which was a lifesaver for two eager players having to take turns! Overall amazing purchase for an even better price! Woupd buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Been a great game, Even better now
customer_reviews.text: Been a lot of fun playing this game. The great news is that there is a whole new game of living under water... I have not been that brave yet. Having too much fun with the existing mode that I am used to. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bond

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old son, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ShellBelleTC

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game! My 11 yr old son wanted the game for his birthday. He loves it. Delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy J

customer_reviews.title: Two can play
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for a game my two kids can play and this is it. With a split screen option the two can play at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Blacker

customer_reviews.title: It's still Minecraft, just not the best version
customer_reviews.text: It's Minecraft PE ported to the Xbox & it's just as difficult to control at in PE...per my teens. The only good thing about it is it's Minecraft
customer_reviews.author: Ada Foshee

customer_reviews.title: Trouble With Codes
customer_reviews.text: The game is fine but when I put the starter pack code in I did not get the whole thing. The skin pack one was left out. When I went to the store it said I did not own the pack. I would like a refund!!
customer_reviews.author: Ibby Boi

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this game! Quality is good. Game works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Product as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product took a while to get here but was what I expected and my son was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kishiflower

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! Got as a gift and my nephew absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: With so many stores closed due to covid regulations and plenty of playing time on the xbox, my grandson was looking for something new and this version of minecraft is his favorite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minecrapt start - Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friend, and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was advertised, expensive but that’s the price for not getting scammed
customer_reviews.author: Mia_117

customer_reviews.title: Wrong platform, right game
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the game for Xbox 360 not Xbox one. How do I send this one back and get the correct item.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is very child friendly and a great family choice!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Codes didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the starter collection so that my son could get whatever skins that he wanted to with the coins. None of the codes worked and Microsoft and Mojang just kept sending me back and fourth blaming the other and it was never resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Minecraft...what more needs to be said. Our 6 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Thisdid not come with the game pass it states is included. $2 extra to buy it isnt bad but i might as well have skipped buying this and just got it off the xbox itself. Hopefullythe codes for the coins works at the very least. Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: J. Skip

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, buy on Cbox one
customer_reviews.text: Game doesn’t start up. I bought it brand new and waster lots of money. Game doesn’t work even with the codes and idk what to do. But my daughter sure is disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, and quick
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my girlfriend, and it arrived quickly and exactly as described. Great game for kids and family!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t use the game at all. I popped it in my Xbox one S and it never showed up on the system so I tried to play it on a regular Xbox one. It showed up but the game never loaded. Idk what’s wrong with it but it doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashadel Harris

customer_reviews.title: Don't get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Neither one of the card work when enter for the start pack.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. And it was great deal considering all the perks that came with it totally worth it. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Schelby

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren loves to play Minecraft. They just received a new X Box one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Eagles69

customer_reviews.title: Great game!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this game gets my 11 year old son and 9 year old daughter together without any fighting! This is a good game for sharpening comprehension and fine motor skills!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Graber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson. He played it until his thumbs hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: Not the right forum but
customer_reviews.text: This took 18 days to arrive, even though I've had Prime for several years. Ehy? Boooo Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Xbox one doesnt read it
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time buying this game and it doesnt work on the xbox one even though it's an xbox one game. Returned 1st one and they shipped another. Still the same issue
customer_reviews.author: tiffany cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Worst Birthday ever!
customer_reviews.text: The cd to the game didn’t even work, my so was HIGHLY disappointed it was for his birthday too. I felt like the worst mother ever!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rogers

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: after a couple of weeks of use, game no longer works. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It was still in plastic when it arrived no scratches or damage works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Schiefer

product_meta.title: Minecraft Starter Collection - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Create. Explore. Survive. Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures. Explore the mighty mountains and living oceans of infinite worlds, expanded further by free game updates, amazing community-made maps, servers, thrilling minigames and more! Survive online with friends on console, mobile, and Windows 10, or share the adventure at home in split-screen multiplayer. This collection includes the Minecraft base game, 700 MINECOINS, and an amazing selection of Mash-ups, Texture Packs, Skin Packs and other fun content to discover. Includes: 700 MINECOINS. Use them to get maps, skins, textures packs and more from the in-game Marketplace! STARTER PACK: Greek Mythology Mash-up, Plastic Texture Pack, Skin Pack 1, and Villains Skin Pack. List of supported cross-play platforms available the website. Additional storage, hardware, broadband (ISP fees apply), Microsoft Account and Xbox Live may be required for setup, some updates, and features, including retention of gameplay settings and information. Online multiplayer on Xbox One requires Xbox Live Gold subscription.
feature_bullets: This collection includes: The Minecraft base game, 700 Minecoins and the Starter Pack DLC, an amazing selection of Mash-ups, Texture Packs, Skin Packs and other fun content to discover.
Create your very own world and build to the limits of your imagination.
Explore mighty mountains and living oceans of infinite worlds, amazing community-made maps, servers, thrilling minigames and more!
Survive online with friends who are on console, mobile, and Windows 10, or share the adventure at home in split-screen multiplayer.
